385367 Patryk

Malakoff videregående skole is a school located in city Moss, south-east from Oslo.
The line i went was called studiespesialisering, and i attended school 3 years in total.
I studied many different courses, from which my favourites were chemistry and maths
The school itself is located close to the centre of Moss, which makes it perfectly accessible
for most people. My 3 years in this school were some of the greatest years of my life, where
i got to meet many of my current friends and studied some great courses.

385514 Haluk

"I have previously attended Ås High School.
The education and teachers were of high quality, and I think I received a good education.
I made good friends, and its location was close to where I lived."

376318 Burhan

Elvebakken videregående skole is located in the best part of Oslo
and the back side overlooks the beautiful river Aker. My favorite activity at school is playing table
tennis with other classes in the garden.
